tool_description: Information about the current Humble Bundles
name: Humble Bundles
title: Humble Bundles

api_list.name: GetBundles
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://humble-bundles1.p.rapidapi.com/bundles"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "humble-bundles1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://humble-bundles1.p.rapidapi.com/bundles"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "humble-bundles1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
